FuncDef:
The l2tpv3 pw command creates an L2TPv3 tunnel and displays the L2TPv3-PW view.
The undo l2tpv3 pw command deletes an L2TPv3 tunnel.
By default, no L2TPv3 tunnel is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a specified L2TPv3 tunnel.
The value is a string of 1 to 19 case-sensitive characters beginning with a letter, spaces or question marks (?) not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An L2TPv3 tunnel supports the following service access modes:
Whole-interface modeC-tag termination modeS-tag termination modeS-tag+C-tag termination mode

Prerequisites
L2TPv3 has been enabled using the l2tpv3 enable command.
